tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: createTrack
api_list.description: Returns ID of newly created package (status=CREATED) or stored ID if this tracking number already exists (status=FOUND).

utterances.utterance: Track the package with tracking number 123456789.
Create a new tracking entry for the package with tracking code ABCDEF123.
Track the shipment with tracking number XYZ987654 and carrier ID USPS.
Find the status of the package with tracking number 987654321 destined for Canada.
Track the parcel with tracking number 1122334455 using carrier FedEx.
Create a tracking entry for the package with tracking number 9988776655 destined for Germany.
Track the shipment with tracking number 5544332211 and carrier DHL.
Find the status of the package with tracking number 123123123 destined for France.
Track the parcel with tracking number 456456456 using carrier UPS.
Create a tracking entry for the package with tracking number 789789789 destined for Japan.

api_list.name: refreshTrack
api_list.description: Submits on-demand refresh request to tracking engine for package with given ID. Please note, that packages in ACTIVE list are auto-tracked regularly so you don't need to do this for such packages.

utterances.utterance: Can you refresh the tracking information for package ID 123456789?
Please submit a refresh request for the package with ID ABC123XYZ.
I need the latest tracking details for package ID 987654321.
Refresh the tracking status for package ID DEF456GHI.
Could you update the tracking information for package ID 1122334455?
Submit a refresh request for package ID JKL789MNO.
Please refresh the tracking details for package ID PQR123STU.
I’d like to get the latest tracking update for package ID 3344556677.
Can you refresh the tracking status for package ID VWX456YZA?
Please update the tracking information for package ID BCD789EFG.

api_list.name: moveTrack
api_list.description: Moves package with given ID to ARCHIVED, TRASHED or back to ACTIVE list.

utterances.utterance: Move the package with ID 12345 to the ARCHIVED list.
Please move the package with ID 67890 to the TRASHED list.
Can you move the package with ID 54321 back to the ACTIVE list?
I need to move the package with ID 98765 to the ARCHIVED list.
Move the package with ID 11223 to the TRASHED list.
Please move the package with ID 33445 back to the ACTIVE list.
Can you move the package with ID 55667 to the ARCHIVED list?
I need to move the package with ID 77889 to the TRASHED list.
Move the package with ID 99001 back to the ACTIVE list.
Please move the package with ID 22334 to the ARCHIVED list.
